name: Suno
description: Suno is an AI-powered platform that transforms text prompts into original music and songs.
longDescription: Suno is a generative artificial intelligence platform designed to democratize music creation by enabling users to produce original songs from simple text prompts. Founded in 2022 by former Kensho AI experts, Suno’s mission is to break barriers between imagination and music, allowing anyone—regardless of musical expertise—to create professional-quality tracks. Users can specify genres, moods, or lyrics, and Suno’s AI generates complete songs with vocals and instrumentation in seconds. The platform serves a wide audience, from hobbyists to professional musicians, fostering creativity and accessibility in music production. Suno operates on a freemium model, offering a free tier with limited song generation and premium plans for enhanced features. Despite legal challenges regarding copyright, Suno continues to innovate, integrating with platforms like Amazon Alexa and expanding its mobile app capabilities.
features: Text-to-song generation creates full songs with vocals and instrumentation from user-provided prompts in seconds.
Genre flexibility allows users to specify styles like pop, jazz, or electronic for tailored music output.
Audio upload feature enables users to incorporate their own sounds or recordings into AI-generated tracks.
Song editing tools, including crop and extend, let users refine tracks for precise customization.
Freemium model provides 10 free songs daily, with paid plans unlocking higher limits and commercial rights.
Mobile app support allows music creation on the go with a user-friendly interface.
Stem extraction enables Pro and Premier users to isolate vocals or instruments for advanced editing.

faqs.question: What is Suno used for?
faqs.answer: Suno is used to create original music and songs from text prompts, enabling users to generate tracks in various genres without musical skills.

faqs.question: Is Suno free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Suno offers a free tier with 10 songs per day, but paid plans provide more features and higher song limits.

faqs.question: Can I use Suno songs commercially?
faqs.answer: Commercial usage rights are available with paid Pro or Premier subscriptions, but not with the free tier.

faqs.question: How do I create a song on Suno?
faqs.answer: Sign up, enter a text prompt describing the song’s genre, mood, or lyrics, and Suno’s AI generates a complete track in seconds.

faqs.question: Does Suno support mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Suno’s mobile app, launched in July 2024, allows users to create music on iOS and Android devices.

faqs.question: What AI models does Suno use?
faqs.answer: Suno uses proprietary AI models, including Bark for text-to-audio, but specific training details are not fully disclosed.

faqs.question: Can I edit songs after generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, Pro and Premier users can crop, extend, or reorder sections of songs using Suno’s editing tools.
